en.title: Rephrase
en.prompt: Rephrase the following paragraph in 5 different ways, to avoid repetition, while keeping its meaning:
en.remark: Rewrite the specified content into multiple versions to avoid text duplication.

metaDescription: Want to avoid repetitive text? Use this AI prompt to rephrase any paragraph in 5 different ways while keeping the original meaning. Enhance your writing and improve SEO!
